name: dvalvec
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3
body: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, chlt), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, clvec))

stmt.origin: dvalveclem(c0, c1, c2, c3, cfv(cfv(cltrn, c0), c1), cfv(cplusg, c3), cfv(cfv(ctendo, c0), c1), cfv(csca, c3), cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cplusg, cfv(csca, c3)), cfv(cmulr, cfv(csca, c3)), cfv(cvsca, c3))

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, chlt), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, clvec))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(clh, c0))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(cfv(cdveca, c0), c1))
-| wceq(cfv(cfv(cltrn, c0), c1), cfv(cfv(cltrn, c0), c1))
-| wceq(cfv(cplusg, c3), cfv(cplusg, c3))
-| wceq(cfv(cfv(ctendo, c0), c1), cfv(cfv(ctendo, c0), c1))

-| wceq(cfv(cmulr, cfv(csca, c3)), cfv(cmulr, cfv(csca, c3)))
-| wceq(cfv(cvsca, c3), cfv(cvsca, c3))
body.pretty:
⊢ ((c0 ∈ HL ∧ c1 ∈ c2)→ c3 ∈ LVec)
⊣ c2 =(LHyp ` c0)
⊣ c3 =((DVecA ` c0)` c1)
⊣ ((LTrn ` c0)` c1)=((LTrn ` c0)` c1)
⊣ (+ ` c3)=(+ ` c3)
⊣ ((TEndo ` c0)` c1)=((TEndo ` c0)` c1)
⊣ (Scalar ` c3)=(Scalar ` c3)
⊣ (Base ` c0)=(Base ` c0)
⊣ (+ `(Scalar ` c3))=(+ `(Scalar ` c3))
⊣ (× `(Scalar ` c3))=(× `(Scalar ` c3))
⊣ (× ` c3)=(× ` c3)

comment: The constructed partial vector space A for a lattice ` K ` is a left vector space. (Contributed by NM, 11-Oct-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 22-Jun-2014.)
